item.title: Special bar please help!
item.dc:creator: @SquirrelScape SquirrelScape
item.description:
@SquirrelScape wrote:

Heres a better TuT:
Ok, your trying to put a special on weapon id 7806. Youve done everything good so far, but to make the special bar appear you need to open up specials.java. Ok, all or MOST servers have dds special right? Well search for dds code, which is 5698, and under it put this in: case 7806:
Now search for 5698 again and it should take you down farther in the file, and do the same, under case 5698: put in
case 7806: Then save and compile and you sir have your special bar.

item.title: Special bar please help!
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

Okay i may sound like a noob idc i suck at codeing but meh

I coded a special but the weapon has no special bar =[ how do i make it like u no special bar
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7806 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 0x426);
getHit(8);
usingSpecial = true;
}
i did that for spec it should work right? =’[ but how do i get the special bar
please and ty for help
